parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the ApsaraMQ forÂ RocketMQ instance to which the resource whose tags you want to query belongs.

> This parameter is required when you query the tags of a topic or a group.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token that determines the start point of the next query.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the resource whose tags you want to query. Valid values:

*   **INSTANCE**
*   **TOPIC**
*   **GROUP**

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags that you want to query. A maximum of 20 tags can be included in the list.
